alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Jefferson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, northwestern Broadwater and north central Jefferson Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 300 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Helena, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Helena, East Helena, Montana City, Clancy, Black Sandy State Park and Spring Meadow Lake State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
